data.name: Lightfire Defense
data.detailed_description:
Tower Defense meets 3D Platforming!

Turrets! Traps! Magic! A variety of possibilities helps you to prevent the dreadful invaders from reaching your Lightfire Beacon. Bring together the lost pieces to assemble a portal that leads to... let's call it - an opportunity to survive all 50 waves of increasingly difficult enemies!

Features

  • Leveling System! Unlock new spells! Increase your stats and pew pew damage!
  • Upgradable Lightfire Beacon which helps you defend it!
  • Master the four elements üî•üåäü™®üå¨Ô∏è
  • A variety of enemies which your spells might be more or less effective against. Choose wisely.
  • Single Player

Lightfire Defense is still in Early Access. Please reach out to us on social media or via email - We will try our best to make your experiences count and use your feedback to make the game better!

data.short_description: You are the last Lightfire Keeper. Use the power of the elements to protect your beacon from incoming waves of enemies. Explore mysterious worlds to find a way to prevail over the inevitable.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: -
